meanings.definition: The highest point or top of a hill or mountain.
meanings.sent1: Reaching the culmen of the hill, we could see the entire valley below.
meanings.sent2: The climber finally reached the culmen of the mountain after a long and arduous journey.
meanings.sent3: The goat stood proudly at the culmen of the hill, surveying its domain.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement at reaching the culmen of the hill was like reaching the stars.
meanings.sent5: The culmen of the hill was bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun.

meanings.definition: The highest point or peak of something, such as a career or achievement.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, she finally reached the culmen of her career.
meanings.sent2: Winning the championship was the culmen of his athletic achievements.
meanings.sent3: Standing on the culmen of success, she felt a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent4: Reaching the culmen of his career, he felt like he was on top of the world.
meanings.sent5: The culmen of her achievements was celebrated by all who knew her.
